sections.title: Composable Leverage
sections.text: Unlock greater potential with up to 15x exposure to yield-bearing tokens, without being restricted to leverage trading.

sections.title: Automated rebalancing
sections.text: With automation features such as liquidation protection, asset rebalancing, and profit-taking, DeFi users can now enjoy a similar experience to centralized exchanges (CEX) while safeguarding their accounts and maximizing returns.

sections.title: Secured and efficient passif management
sections.text: Provide liquidity and earn low-risk APY from borrower interest fees. Pools are insurred by accumulated protocol fees and utilizes control theory to optimize borrowing costs, thereby maximizing capital efficiency on the protocol.
